scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w ui"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "WASM_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/forum.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a forum network -b https://bootstrap.holo.host quic -p kitsune-proxy://f3gH2VMkJ4qvZJOXx0ccL_Zo5n-s_CnBjSzAsEHHDCA/kitsune-quic/h/137.184.142.208/p/5788/-- " "npm run playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./workdir
scripts.build:zomes: RUSTFLAGS="$RUSTFLAGS -A unused-imports -A dead_code -A unused_variables" CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features exercise${EXERCISE}step${STEP}
